story: Mohamed Alaa El Din shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Tal Raviv — Being a Developer Makes You Valuable. Learning How to Market Makes You Dangerous
caption: talsraviv.com
description: The best part of engineering isn’t the technical details or the particular science behind it, rather, it’s the opportunity to solve an unfairly hard problem in a way no one has before. The harder the problem the more exciting it is. As a chemical-turned-software engineer, I can say the thrill is the...
